title: The Dowager Magus
description: Set during the events of the first Spellslinger book, Mer’essan, a Dowager Magus of the Jan’Tep finds her contemplations interrupted by a mysterious stranger who brings unexpected danger into Mer’essan’s life.This is one of several short stories that you can read for free after signing up for the author's newsletter: htt ps: //decastell. com/secrets/
author: Sebastien de Castell
